name: Fine Dashboard – Client
author: Ketchlabs

sections.description:
A template to jumpstart your custom dashboard!
Use this with Fine Dashboard – Source to populate modules on the dashboard.

About The Project

If you want to create a custom WordPress dashboard this is a good place to start.

Usage

The Fine Dashboard settings will show under “Settings” if on localhost. Otherwise to show the settings page add the variable “?force_show_FDASH” to the end of the url.

Contact

Luke Ketchen – http://lukeketchen.com/
Project Link: https://github.com/lukeketchen/fine-dashboard

Acknowledgments

Dashboard icons created by Slidicon – https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/dashboard
